RemoteReadyBootcamp.title: Be Remote Ready
RemoteReadyBootcamp.description: Ready to earn and travel in 14 days - 14 day Bootcamp taught by Real Digital Nomads in Spain, Thailand, Japan, Brazil.
features: Live interactive sessions with Real Digital Nomads

AiDigitalCourse.title: Start Your AI Business for Passive Income
AiDigitalCourse.description: Blueprint for launching your AI-powered online business. This digital course takes you through proven frameworks to automate income streams, create AI-based products, and build your business, all from anywhere in the world.
features: Access to automation and AI tools tutorials
Guides for creating and monetizing digital assets
Join an exclusive community of ambitious learners

AiChallenge.title: 30 Day AI Content Challenge
AiChallenge.description: Build a Content Empire Without Being on Camera. This digital challenge walks you step-by-step through tools, techniques, and strategies to build a content brand, grow your audience, and monetize your creativity using AI automation.
features: 30-day guided challenge to master AI video content creation
Daily lessons, assignments, and prompts for hands-on learning
Learn to use top AI tools for video scripting, voice, and editing
Discover content monetization models and growth tactics
Join a community of creators building profitable AI content brands
